security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a collection of personnel records related to Jeffrey Facter's employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), including payroll authorizations, leave records, and a payroll certification form.
summary_one_paragraph: This document comprises personnel records pertaining to Jeffrey Facter's employment with the HSCA, covering the period from December 1976 to April 1978. It contains payroll authorization forms detailing his appointment as Staff Counsel, salary adjustments, and relevant dates signed by Louis Stokes and Henry B. Gonzalez, along with a personal leave record for 1978 and a payroll certification form from January 1977, all illustrating Facter's administrative details and employment history within the committee.
title: Staff Payroll Records related to Jeffrey Facter
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
